answers.author: Michael Morrison
answers.text:
We  established NB101 in New Braunfels, Texas  to re-orient our long term employees. Contact Julie O'Connell @ JOConnell@nbtexas.org.  During the sessions, we presented our mission and values, talked about city manager form, had each of the department directors discuss their respective departments and held a question and answer session at the end .

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member that is looking for examples of how to reorient employees who didn't go through a new employee orientation program (NEO).   Does anyone do a re-employee orientation?  
Thanks,
Greg Stopka, Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
866-778-8067
gstopka@transformgov.org
title: Reorienting Employee
